text:
Affirm (https://www.affirm.com/) | Engineering / Ops / Analytics / Sales / Product / HR / Recruiting / Design | San Francisco, NYC | Onsite | Fulltime

Affirm offers services that empower consumers to advance their financial well-being. Affirm was started by Max Levchin (PayPal, Slide, HVF) with the goal of revolutionizing the banking industry to be more accountable and accessible to consumers.

We raised $200 million at the end of 2017 and are growing quickly. We are hiring in all areas of the company to maintain growth and to get into more product areas. There's still lots to do!

An overview of our current products: https://www.affirm.com/buy-with-affirm/

Some perks / benefits: competitive salary + equity - health/ dental/ vision insurance - unlimited time off (people take an average of 4 weeks off per year) - learning and development budget - transportation stipend - fitness stipend - phone stipend - stipend to use Affirm products so you know the experience from a user standpoint - 1 audiobook through Audible per month, plus 1 physical book per quarter - free lunch and dinner at the office

Come help us build honest and transparent financial products that help people!

Apply at https://bit.ly/2NjlwAE
